ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: Charm fight them... easiest way for a bard to tackle those two (at your level anyway).  You can also use Bellow, DDD, or CoD against your uncharmed opponent to
ygData.messageBody:
Charm fight them... easiest way for a bard to tackle those two (at your
level anyway). You can also use Bellow, DDD, or CoD against your uncharmed
opponent to guarantee he loses.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 2:50 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
>
>
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> I also meant to ask this in my last email.........
>
> Can someone give me a good tactic on how I can take
> Choon/Froon, I hear
> stuff about Fear/Chains etc but Fear has a really poor range
> and you have
> to be within hitting range for it to work, if I get too close
> to Choon he
> hits me and interupts my song, am I doing something wrong or
> is it just a
> hard trick to pull off?
>
> I tried to melee Choon but I barely hit him, maybe I should
> wait till level
> 28 so that I may have a chance with my Staff Proc (Chaotic Feedback).
>
> Any help/info would be greatly appreciated, and if anyone on Veeshan
> fancies helping a fellow bard then that would also be appreciated too.
>
> Madagan, bard of 27 songs - Veeshan
>
>
>
>
>
> Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...> on 10/11/99 18:03:49
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
>
>
>
>
> From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>
>
> I can tell you that I went to go kill them one night with a level 31
> ranger and my 29th druid and the ranger ended up dying (although I was
> not full mana and wasn't ready for the pull)...they are mean...conned
> yellow to me at 29. If you can keep him from pounding on you too much
> you may be able to have the mage nuke him but...at your level I would
> be really careful adn have an escape route planned....
>
>
> > >
> > >I payed 60pp for a Lambent stone last night (was asking 100pp), I
> > also got
> > >myself 2 sapphires and now all I need is the rune from Choon in WK.
> > Anyone
> > >know hard this is to get, bearing in mind I am only level 27. My
> > friend
> > >will help me kill him (level 28 Mage) so I think we could take him,
> > can
> > >anyone tell me how hard Choon is to locate??
> > >
> > >Madagan, Bard of 27 songs - Veeshan
> >
> >
